verses.verse: Children,<WG5043> obey<WG5219> your parents<WG1118> in the Lord,<WG2962> for this<WG3778> is right.<WG1342>
Honor<WG5091> your father<WG3962> and mother<WG3384> (which<WG3748> is the first<WG4413> commandment<WG1785> with a promise<WG1860>),
that it may be well<WG2095> with you, and that you may live<WG3118> long<WG3118> on the earth.<WG1093>
And, fathers,<WG3962> do not provoke<WG3949> your children<WG5043> to anger;<WG3949> but bring<WG1625> them up in the discipline<WG3809> and instruction<WG3559> of the Lord.<WG2962>

Slaves,<WG1401> be obedient<WG5219> to those<WG3588> who are your masters<WG2962> according<WG2596> to the flesh,<WG4561> with fear<WG5401> and trembling,<WG5156> in the sincerity<WG572> of your heart,<WG2588> as to Christ;<WG5547>
not by way<WG2596> of eyeservice,<WG3787> as men-pleasers, but as slaves<WG1401> of Christ,<WG5547> doing<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of God<WG2316> from the heart.<WG5590>
With good<WG2133> will<WG2133> render<WG1398> service,<WG1398> as to the Lord,<WG2962> and not to men,<WG444>

knowing<WG3609> that whatever<WG1437> <WG5100> good<WG18> thing<WG18> each<WG1538> one<WG1538> does,<WG4160> this<WG3778> he will receive<WG2865> back<WG2865> from the Lord,<WG2962> whether<WG1535> slave<WG1401> or<WG1535> free.<WG1658>

And, masters,<WG2962> do<WG4160> the same<WG846> things<WG846> to them, and give<WG447> up threatening,<WG547> knowing<WG3609> that both<WG2532> their Master<WG2962> and yours<WG4771> is in heaven,<WG3772> and there is no<WG3756> partiality<WG4382> with Him.
Finally,<WG3062> be strong<WG1743> in the Lord,<WG2962> and in the strength<WG2904> of His might.<WG2479>
Put<WG1746> on the full<WG3833> armor<WG3833> of God,<WG2316> that you may be able<WG1410> to stand<WG2476> firm<WG2476> against<WG4314> the schemes<WG3180> of the devil.<WG1228>

For our struggle<WG3823> is not against<WG4314> flesh<WG4561> and blood,<WG129> but against<WG4314> the rulers,<WG746> against<WG4314> the powers,<WG1849> against<WG4314> the world<WG2888> forces<WG2888> of this<WG3778> darkness,<WG4655> against<WG4314> the spiritual<WG4152> [forces] of wickedness<WG4189> in the heavenly<WG2032> [places.]

Therefore,<WG1223> <WG3778> take<WG353> up the full<WG3833> armor<WG3833> of God,<WG2316> that you may be able<WG1410> to resist<WG436> in the evil<WG4190> day,<WG2250> and having done<WG2716> everything,<WG537> to stand<WG2476> firm.<WG2476>
Stand<WG2476> firm<WG2476> therefore,<WG3767> having girded<WG4024> your loins<WG3751> with truth,<WG225> and having put<WG1746> on the breastplate<WG2382> of righteousness,<WG1343>
and having shod<WG5265> your feet<WG4228> with the preparation<WG2091> of the gospel<WG2098> of peace;<WG1515>

in addition to all,<WG3956> taking<WG353> up the shield<WG2375> of faith<WG4102> with which<WG3739> you will be able<WG1410> to extinguish<WG4570> all<WG3956> the flaming<WG4448> missiles<WG956> of the evil<WG4190> [one.]
And take<WG1209> the helmet<WG4030> of salvation,<WG4992> and the sword<WG3162> of the Spirit,<WG4151> which<WG3739> is the word<WG4487> of God.<WG2316>

With all<WG3956> prayer<WG4335> and petition<WG1162> pray<WG4336> at all<WG3956> times<WG2540> in the Spirit,<WG4151> and with this<WG846> in view,<WG1519> be on the alert<WG69> with all<WG3956> perseverance<WG4343> and petition<WG1162> for all<WG3956> the saints,<WG40>

and [pray] on my behalf,<WG5228> that utterance<WG3056> may be given<WG1325> to me in the opening<WG457> of my mouth,<WG4750> to make<WG1107> known<WG1107> with boldness<WG3954> the mystery<WG3466> of the gospel,<WG2098>
for which<WG3739> I am<WG4243> an ambassador<WG4243> in chains;<WG254> that in [proclaiming] it I may speak<WG3955> boldly,<WG3955> as I ought<WG1163> to speak.<WG2980>

But that you also<WG2532> may know<WG3609> about<WG2596> my circumstances,<WG3588> <WG2596> how<WG5101> I am doing,<WG4238> Tychicus,<WG5190> the beloved<WG27> brother<WG80> and faithful<WG4103> minister<WG1249> in the Lord,<WG2962> will make<WG1107> everything<WG3956> known<WG1107> to you.
And I have sent<WG3992> him to you for this<WG3778> very<WG846> purpose, so<WG2443> that you may know<WG1097> about<WG4012> us, and that he may comfort<WG3870> your hearts.<WG2588>
Peace<WG1515> be to the brethren,<WG80> and love<WG26> with faith,<WG4102> from God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962> and the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
Grace<WG5485> be with all<WG3956> those<WG3588> who love<WG25> our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> with [a love] incorruptible.<WG861>
